mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.inv_sku_id AS "invSku.id", a.order_detail_id AS "orderDetail.id", a.request_detail_id AS "requestDetail.id", a.transfer_detail_id AS "transferDetail.id", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO biz_inventory_order_request( id, inv_sku_id,
order_detail_id,
request_detail_id,
transfer_detail_id,
status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{invSku.id},
#{orderDetail.id},
#{requestDetail.id},
#{transferDetail.id},
#{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE biz_inventory_order_request SET inv_sku_id = #{invSku.id},
order_detail_id = #{orderDetail.id},
request_detail_id = #{requestDetail.id},
transfer_detail_id = #{transferDetail.id},
u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
